item.title: Transcode Mp4 Videos to X265 and Lower Bitrate
item.description: Yesterday at work I needed to send some video files, however they were huge. I used ffmpeg to transcode the files to H.265 and lowered the bitrate until they were an acceptable size – I did this manually on the CLI a few times, and since there were several files in the directory I quickly tired of that. So of course I needed a script to walk through the dir and do this for me!
